pyntacle.utils.modules_utils module¶

class ModuleUtils(modules: list, graph: igraph.Graph, algorithm: str)[source]¶

Bases: object

add_modules_info()[source]¶

[EXPAND]

Parameters:algorithm_used –
Returns:
filter_subgraphs(min_nodes=None, max_nodes=None, min_components=None, max_components=None)[source]¶

[EXPAND]

Parameters:
  • min_nodes – minimum set size (default is None)
  • max_nodes – maximum set size (default is None)
  • min_components – minimum number of components that graph must havew. Default is None (all components)
  • max_components – maximum number of components that graph must havew. Default is None (all components)
get_modules()[source]¶

Return the list of graph modules (a list of igraph.Graph objects)

label_modules_in_graph()[source]¶

Add to each node and edge an attribute that trace it to each module (a way to distinguish each components). name will be assigned to the proprietary “__module” attribute for each graph and edge

logger = None¶
modules_overlaps()[source]¶

Verify that the modules are not overlapping

Returns:a list of the same sizes of the modules in input; True if the module overlaps, False otherwise)
